tooltip.kaleidoscope_cookery.stove: The heat source block of the kitchen utensils, lit with flint and steel
tip.kaleidoscope_cookery.pot.need_lit_st: A stove that needs to be lit underneath
tip.kaleidoscope_cookery.pot.add_ingredi: Add the ingredients, put them all in and start stir-frying with a Kitchen Shovel
tip.kaleidoscope_cookery.pot.need_bowl: Need to right click on the bowl to take it out
tip.kaleidoscope_cookery.pot.need_kitche: Need sneak and right click with a kitchen shovel to take it out
